summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for transportation charges incurred on February 18, 2002. The total amount due is $125.36, with details on discounts and charges outlined.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the recipient of the invoice for FedEx services, indicating his use of their shipping services.

events.title: FedEx Shipment
events.description: A shipment was picked up by FedEx for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The total charges for the FedEx services amount to $125.36.
The invoice indicates a discount of $3.81 applied to the total.
The shipment was picked up on February 18, 2002.
The document includes a tracking ID for the shipment.
